text: Eadward kyngc gret Wulfwi biscop & Norðman scirgerefan & ælfwine Merefinnes sunu & ealle mine þeignes on Hamtunscire frendlice.

& ic kyþe eow þæt ic habbe gegifen Criste & Sancte Petre into Westmynstre Roteland & eall þæt þær to herð mid saca & mid socne, mid tolle & mid teame & on eallan ðingan swa full & swa forð swa hit me silfan on handa stod.
& ic ann þæt Eadgiþ seo hlefdige hit on hande habbe swa lange swa heo libbe & ælce gære þæt munster þær of gegodige.
